DOC.detailed_description: This open label , multicenter , dose escalation multidose study MDX-11-5 , fully human monoclonal IgG4 antibody target Programed Death-Ligand 1 ( PD-L1 ) . The study consist 3 period : Screening ( 28 day ) , Treatment ( 16 six-week cycle ) , Follow-up ( 6 month ) .
DOC.criteria: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) Performance Status 0 1 The malignancy include relapsed/refractory renal cell carcinoma , nonsmall cell lung cancer , colorectal adenocarcinoma , malignant melanoma , advanced/metastatic epithelial ovarian cancer , gastric cancer , pancreatic cancer breastcancer Must measurable disease Prior therapy antiPD 1 , antiPDL 1 , antiCytotoxic TLymphocyte Antigen 4 antibody ( agent target Tcell costimulation )
